title: Kanye West Is Escorted From Skechers Offices, Company Says
description: The footwear company said Mr. West, also known as Ye, had been “engaged in unauthorized filming” at one of its corporate offices in Los Angeles.
dc:creator: Matt Stevens
media:credit: Julien De Rosa/Agence France-Presse — Getty Images
media:description: Kanye West in Paris this month.
